1.caption_en:
A circular ecosystem-mapping template showing "HUMAN" needs at the center, concentric rings for stakeholders and offerings, and outer rings labeled CORE MARKET SEGMENTS and COMPLEMENTARY SEGMENTS with radial sectors for Enablers, Producers, and Orchestrators.

{
  "title": "Ecosystem Wheel Template",
  "description": "Circular mapping template for ecosystem design with human needs at the center, concentric rings and radial sectors for core and complementary market segments.",
  "orientation": "circular",
  "dimensions": {
    "width_px": 768,
    "height_px": 771
  },
  "style": "flat infographic, muted teal and gray palette",
  "colors": [
    "teal",
    "light gray",
    "white",
    "dark gray"
  ],
  "center": {
    "label": "HUMAN",
    "inner_ring_label": "NEEDS",
    "prompt": "What is the primary need of this human in this ecosystem?"
  },
  "rings": [
    {
      "name": "inner_ring",
      "purpose": "Capture human needs and immediate value"
    },
    {
      "name": "middle_ring",
      "purpose": "Stakeholders and offerings (Enablers, Producers, Orchestrators)"
    },
    {
      "name": "outer_ring_core",
      "label": "CORE MARKET SEGMENTS",
      "purpose": "Primary market segments around the ecosystem"
    },
    {
      "name": "outer_ring_complementary",
      "label": "COMPLEMENTARY SEGMENTS",
      "purpose": "Adjacent or supporting market segments"
    }
  ],
  "radial_sectors": {
    "count": 8,
    "labels": [
      "sector_1",
      "sector_2",
      "sector_3",
      "sector_4",
      "sector_5",
      "sector_6",
      "sector_7",
      "sector_8"
    ],
    "notable_annotations": [
      "Enablers",
      "Producers",
      "Orchestrators"
    ]
  },
  "examples_list": [
    "Health",
    "Recreation",
    "Education",
    "Work",
    "Entertainment",
    "Socialization",
    "Living",
    "Mobility",
    "Spirituality",
    "Shopping",
    "Food"
  ],
  "annotations": [
    "white chevron breaks on outer ring",
    "thin concentric guide rings divided into radial slices",
    "teal wedge highlighting a selected sector"
  ],
  "language": "English",
  "intended_use": "Design and map ecosystems; identify market segments and stakeholder roles around human needs",
  "file_type": "raster image"
}
